Name: Revenge Ruff
LongDescription: Uses the Pickup ability to make it easier to find items. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Aipom and Ambipom.  Finding a Revenge Ruff at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
